descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a checker patterned square surrounded on two sides by a solid color.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...the same as the input grid size.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...duplicate the entire grid, then fill in the solid color to exactly match the checker pattern. Finally result should be entirely checker patterned.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...the pattern on a black grid
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...the same size as a input grid
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...imagine the same pattern on the input grid 6x6 as output grid

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...an alternating pattern of colors on top of another color.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...stays the same.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...copy over the input. Continue the alternating pattern of colors so they replace the color that is behind them. You should end up with only the alternating color pattern as the same size grid as the input.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a pattern of alternating colors, with a border on the right
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size... is the same as the input.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...reverse the two colors of the pattern. (Example: blue, red, blue, red)Remove the border in the input picture, so that the entire grid with the new pattern.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...first grid mixed of color of block will show,in second grid size of block and colour will change, in thrid block will reduce of size
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...in last row of block will replaced by pink and green
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...most of block will fill by pink and orange color

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see....colored squares on a grid, every other one is a different color, three are surrounded on 2 sides with solid colored rows, number of rows is up to you
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...do a pattern of 2 different colored squares, like pink then green, pink then green, all through the grid, but on 3 of them add a 2 side border of a solid color, you choose how many border rows you want to add

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see... a checkerboard pattern with a different color bordering it.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size... remains the same.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to... Replace the border with the same checkerboard pattern until the entire grid is covered. It should just be a checkerboard and nothing else.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a checkerboard pattern in one corner
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...same as input
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...continue the checkerboard pattern in the corner to fill out rest of grid

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a square with alternating colors with some background pixels in a different color surrounding it on two sides.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is the same size as the original.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...copy the two color square onto the new grid. Fill the background squares with the alternating color pattern so the entire grid is two colors.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a checkerboard pattern bordered by a solid color
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...focus on the checkerboard pattern
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...recreate the checkerboard pattern but with the colors switched

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a diagonal pattern in the top left portion of the grid followed by solid colored lines to the right and bottom.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is the same as the input grid size.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...repeat the diagonal pattern throughout the entire grid.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...three different colors, two of those colors are in an alternating pattern that forms a square or rectangle. The third color surrounds the shape made by the first two colors.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...stays the same.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...replace the third color by continuing the pattern created by the first two colors. By the time you are done, you should have an entire grid of two alternating colors.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a square pattern with a single color to its right.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...stays the same as the input grid
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...apply the pattern to the new grid while not using the single color item that includes the bottom and right in the input grid. You will only use the pattern in the input grid and apply it to the new output grid.

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...the black key on the ouput
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...not changed grid size.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...me choose corner place of blue colors

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see... a pattern in the top left corner and a border of a different color
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...stays the same
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...remove the solid color border and repeat the corner pattern

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...a repeating pattern of two colors. You will also see a solid colored border on the bottom and right sides.
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is the same as the input grid size.
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...remove the solid colored border, and just continue the two color pattern to fill the whole grid.
